name: Unity3dtetris
body:
### Welcome to Unity3D Tetris .

![Tetris Main Menu](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/21308707/TetrisGithub/mainmenu.png)


This is a project page for a Tetris Game developed by Unity3D, the purpose of the game is to compare how users brain activities react when users are in a normal mode vs in a panic mode. In this game, we give users 3 mode of game play , dynamic ,  Dynamic Manual and Constant 

[https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/21308707/TetrisGithub/menuselect.png](Tetris Menu )

For Dynamic Mode - Game Speed increases when users clear a line 
Fr Dynamic Manual - Game Speed increases when users clear a line , however users can control the speed of the game 
For Constant - Game Speed do not change when users clear the line, 


To play the game demo a Unity Web player can be played here http://bit.ly/11pYNpJ

_For those who do not have unity web player please download it here http://unity3d.com/webplayer/_
```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```

### Experiment Plan 
We've crafted some handsome templates for you to use. Go ahead and continue to layouts to browse through them. You can easily go back to edit your page before publishing. After publishing your page, you can revisit the page generator and switch to another theme. Your Page content will be preserved if it remained markdown format.

### Documentation ?
This page will also serve as a documentation page too, to check our presentation you can check at http://slid.es/williamwidjaja/unity3dtetris

### Authors and Contributors

The game is originally developed by Sergio Nunes in 2011 for an earlier experiment. The game is then rewritten by Umair Ejaz(@habupain) in 2013 under the game direction the direction of (William Widjaja) @clauxz who is the Research Experiment Investigator.
